title: Random FPS drops
body: So it's a pretty simple problem, just random fps drops nothing else. But i have had my laptop off for 27 days so i was wondering if this is the problem? If not how can i fix this?

replies.body: It could be outdated drivers if it's been a while!  But other factors can cause frame drops too, like bad game files.  Your best bet would be to go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot, and test in a custom game.  I hope that helps!
